scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:features
scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @AuditLog' features
scripts.test:auditlogs: echo $PNC_HOST && ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@AuditLog and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @Excluded' features
scripts.test:preprod: SKIP_PNC_VALIDATION=true ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@PreProdTest and not @AuditLog and not @Excluded' features
scripts.test:chunk: bash ./scripts/run_test_chunk.sh 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @AuditLog'
scripts.test:chunk:nextUI: nextUI=true bash ./scripts/run_test_chunk.sh 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @AuditLog and @NextUI'
scripts.test:chunk:conductor: bash ./scripts/run_test_chunk.sh 'not @Excluded and not @ExcludedOnMaster and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @AuditLog and not @ExcludedOnConductor'
scripts.test:nextUI:must: nextUI=true node --tls-min-v1.0 ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@Must and @NextUI and not @AuditLog' features
scripts.test:nextUI:auditlogs: echo $PNC_HOST && nextUI=true node --tls-min-v1.0 ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@AuditLog and @NextUI and not @OnlyRunsOnPNC and not @Excluded' features
scripts.test:nextUI:must:auditlogs: nextUI=true node --tls-min-v1.0 ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@Must and @AuditLog and @NextUI' features
scripts.test:nextUI:preprodauditlogs: nextUI=true node --tls-min-v1.0 ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@PreProdTest and @NextUI and @AuditLog and not @Excluded' features
scripts.test:nextUI:preprod: SKIP_PNC_VALIDATION=true nextUI=true node --tls-min-v1.0 ./node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require steps --retry 5 --no-strict --exit --publish-quiet --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --fail-fast --tags '@PreProdTest and @NextUI and not @AuditLog and not @Excluded' features
